  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109656</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109656</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Polarisation of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polarisation des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Polarisation de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polarisation da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Polarizzazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόλωση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Polarización de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations of light polarisation set-ups show that light polarised similar to a Polaroid is transmitted (left) while light polarised perpendicular to the polarisation of a Polaroid is absorbed (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polarised light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Polaroids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unpolarised light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen der hellen Polarisation 
Installationen zeigen, daß Licht polarisiertes ähnliches einem 
Polaroid übertragen wird (link) während Licht polarisiertes 
Senkrechtes zur Polarisation eines Polaroids aufgesogen wird (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations des installations légères de 
polarisation prouvent que semblable polarisé par lumière à un 
polaroïd est transmis (gauche) tandis que la perpendiculaire 
polarisée par lumière à la polarisation d'un polaroïd est 
absorbée (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações de instalações claras do 
polarisation mostram que similar polarizado luz a um polaroid está 
transmitido (esquerdo) quando a perpendicular polarizada luz ao 
polarisation de um polaroid for absorvida (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni delle messe a punto chiare di
polarizzazione indicano che simile polarizzato luce ad un polaroid è 
trasmesso (di sinistra) mentre la perpendicolare polarizzata luce alla
polarizzazione di un polaroid è assorbita (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις των ελαφριών οργανώσεων πόλωσης
δείχνουν ότι το φως που πολώνεται παρόμοιο με ένα Polaroid 
διαβιβάζεται (αριστερός) ενώ πολωμένη η φως κάθετος στην πόλωση 
ενός Polaroid απορροφάται (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones de las disposiciones ligeras 
de la polarización muestran que similar polarizada luz a una polaroid
está transmitido (izquierdo) mientras que el perpendicular polarizado
luz a la polarización de una polaroid se absorbe (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtabsorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polarisiertes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polaroide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unpolarised Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">absorption de la lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polarisation légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière polarisée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Polaroïds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unpolarised la lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">absorption claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polarisation claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz polarizada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polaroids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unpolarised a luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assorbimento della luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polarizzazione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce polarizzata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Polaroids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unpolarised la luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά απορρόφηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά πόλωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολωμένο φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polarización ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
